Title: Authorizes the city of Auburn to prefer local businesses in awarding public contracts
Summary: Authorizes the city of Auburn to grant a preference to local businesses located in Cayuga county in awarding city contracts for public works and purchases, when such contracts do not exceed $100,000.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing the city of Auburn to prefer businesses located in the county of Cayuga in awarding public contracts
